idea: We are manufacturer of all type of automated systems, we use machine learning to make the things automated using our technologies with the help of hardware and software
name: SMART HOME INDIA

idea:
CloudChef is a platform where Chefs can write recipes online and get it delivered across the world enabling Chefs to scale from a brick and mortar to a global scale. This is enabled by our robotic kitchen where humans and robots work in synchrony to perfectly recreate these
recipes.

CloudChef is founded by 3 IIT Bombay Alumni (Computer Science, Electrical and Mechanical Engineering) with experience in Samsung, Ola Cabs, Texas Instruments, Tonbo Imaging, etc. One Co-founder has already started a company(SoundRex) before this.
name: CLOUDCHEF PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Fitternity is India's largest online preventive healthcare platform that provides an integrated eco-system to help users start & sustain their fitness journey. It not only enables users to discover, experience and buy professional services (linked to exercise, health eating & overall lifestyle) but actually supports them to use these services effectively and meet their goals.
Currently integrated with a vast network of 12,000+ verified service partners including gyms, studios, personal trainers, dieticians, healthy food kitchens etc through technology we have powered the journey of 5.5 Million consumers with the aim to radicalise the way 65 Million urban Indians consume fitness.
name: FITTERNITY HEALTH E-SOLUTION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We at greyrobotics are involved in the designing and building of different kinds of robots which can be used by beginners to learn various robotic applications. Products from GreyRobotics are used to introduce its users to the fundamentals of robotics and control of mobile robots. We also provide training sessions to students on our developed robotic kits. Our products are sold all over India through Amazon.in  . Visit us at GreyRobotics Website to check our products.
name: GreyRobotics

idea:
Our project is a brick and mortar business with four clear innovations. The innovations are to fill in the gaps which exist in the industry today and can be a clear differentiator. This will also give us a first mover advantage and help us get into the big league. Let me give you a top view of the same.
Innovations:
• Market access model ahead of time; Our project entails getting deep into peri -urban areas of India till towns of approx. 200K population. These geographies has some of the highest GDP growth and lacks adequate access to healthcare. Our believe is that with Ayushman Bharat we will be aligning ourselves and be in a position to reap benefits which will make business sense.
• Medical treatment innovation for better patient outcome. This is to combine the pharma promotion to GPs/CPs with rapid diagnostics so that the clinician can correctly diagnose the condition and deliver a better treatment outcome
• Commercial innovation: We are also exploiting the additional channel opportunity available with same channels. We will introduce consumer health products with the same sales force with BTL and ATL promotions
• Human innovation: We have developed a model for the sales force to do away with the existing managerial structure and make it possible for employees to decide their career growth themselves every year. Its something unique which will be exciting.
• We want to create ~1000 employment in 5-7 years in the tier-2 and below cities.
name: Goodhums Lifesciences Pvt Ltd

idea: We are building a road quality based GIS to enable Data Driven Governance and provide commercial/retail value-added mobility solution
name: RoadCare
